user_query: Show me top 10 Business Management courses searching from all platform

debug_info.user_query: Show me top 10 Business Management courses searching from all platform

llm_generated_queries.thought_process: User asked for 'Business Management'. No specific synonyms defined for this term, so using the base term directly. Requesting top 10 courses from all platforms implies no provider filter.
